description:
The Super Bowl is the number one most highly-wagered on game in all of sports. Literally billions of dollars are won and lost each year on the game. This course will teach you everything you need to know in order to bring home your piece of that money.

In this course, we'll cover everything you need to know in order to make some serious money by wagering on the sports world's number one attraction. The Super Bowl is different from your regular, everyday game, and we'll cover every aspect of that in this course.

So whether you're a seasoned gambler, or a first time punter, there's information here that you'll need in order to start making and placing your first bets.
title: Betting the Super Bowl: How Make Smart Wagers and Win
